mobs.LongDesc: A large drooling canine animal is roaming around here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large, canine looking animal, this Wolfos is covered in a gray fur. It's
silver mane gives it an ominous feeling, making you wonder if it is safe to
be around. It's large, sharp, claws assure you that it means business...

mobs.LongDesc: A dark, ominous, phantom creature stands here, awaiting a challenger.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nothing but a mere emulated mockery of the real Gannondorf, this Phantom has
all the hatred stored up inside him about his master, and you. He doesn't
take kindly to visitors, and I don't think he takes kindly to you. He seems
to glide about the room paying no attention to the laws of gravity and motion
as you know it. He is quite a hard target to keep track of, but maybe if you
can hold him still for a while...

mobs.LongDesc: A skull floats around here, emitting a strange green aura.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nothing but an old skull, Bubbles float about the rooms as though they were
floating within a large ping-pong ball, or some type of childs bouncing ball.
They have small, batwing like ears replacing what normal ears they should
have had, and their eyeballs seem to hover within the sockets because there
is no muscle to hold them in.

mobs.LongDesc: A skull floats around here, emitting a strange blue aura.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nothing but an old skull, Bubbles float about the rooms as though they were
floating within a large ping-pong ball, or some type of childs bouncing ball.
They have small, batwing like ears replacing what normal ears they should
have had, and their eyeballs seem to hover within the sockets because there
is no muscle to hold them in.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, severed hand dances about, waiting to lunge at its next victim.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking like nothing more than a large hand, this monster is known to hover
along walls and hide among the shadows, waiting for someone to throw itself
at, and to eventually squeeze the life out of them.

mobs.LongDesc: A strange flower-bulb looking plant grows here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
These overgrown plants look like flower buds that haven't bloomed. These Deku
Babas however...have sharp teeth. Too bad they won't let you near enough
their stem to get a good whack at it, guess you'll just have to hit 'em the
hard way.

mobs.LongDesc: A ghost wearing a tattered dress spins wildy through the air.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Meg is one of the four Poe Sisters. She was turned into a ghost, like her
sisters, by a dark, evil, scary man. She looks to be the girl/ghost in all of
the pictures around this room. Its almost a shame to have to kill her. But
then again, she IS already dead...

mobs.LongDesc: A ghost wearing a tattered dress spins wildy through the air.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Beth is one of the four Poe sisters. Like Meg, Joelle, and Amy, she was
turned into this ghastly form by a male Gerudo theif, out to take over the
world. Now she and her sisters spend most of their time in this temple,
waiting to be sent out of this earthly domain, and go to a place of final
resting.

mobs.LongDesc: A ghost wearing a tattered dress spins wildy through the air.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Joelle, another of the Poe sisters, is the most daring. Loving to taunt
people before she attacks them, she would appear in her own portraits and
move around, just to play tricks on people. Once they were thoroughly
confused, she would strike, while they were too dazed to fight back.

mobs.LongDesc: A ghost wearing a tattered dress spins wildy through the air.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Amy is the puzzlemaster of the Poe sisters. She would set huge block puzzles
and give her victims a chance to fight for their freedom. If they solved her
puzzle in the time allotted, she would fight them face to face. If they
failed to solve the puzzle, well.....
